reviewText: We know fathers have sexual fixations on their daughters but the fact that mothers have sexual fixations on their sons is rarely acknowledged.  And this film reveals the sexism that exists in films.  A film would never expose the genitals of a young girl (e.g., Lolita films) but here, the genital of this young boy are clearly shown in a seduction scene.

A very enjoyable movie with an interesting story about incest and the sexual development of a young boy. There is some nudity involving the boy and there are a lot of issues that are exposed that are not completely or satisfactorily dealt with I would recommend this to those who enjoy coming of age movies
